name: @otris/jsdoc-tsd
description: JSDoc Template for generate typescript definition files from JSDoc comments

scripts.prepublish: npm run re-compile && cp src-out/src/core/*.js ./ && npm run generate-package-lock
scripts.generate-package-lock: node -e "var fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('package-lock.json')) fs.unlinkSync('package-lock.json')" && synp --source-file yarn.lock
scripts.parse-example: move /Y src-out\src\core\publish.js src-out\src\core\publish.backup.js && copy /Y src-out\src\core\publish-example.js src-out\src\core\publish.js && jsdoc -r exampleProject -t src-out\src\core && move /Y src-out\src\core\publish.backup.js src-out\src\core\publish.js

author: Maximilian Wehrstedt
